newsitem.title: USA: ChaseMellon to buy NationsBank's transfer business.
newsitem.headline: ChaseMellon to buy NationsBank's transfer business.

text.p: ChaseMellon Shareholder Services, a joint venture of Chase Manhattan Bank and Mellon Bank, said on Wednesday it has signed a letter of intent to acquire the stock transfer business of NationsBank Corp.
Terms for the business, which had been inherited from Boatmen's Bancshares Inc, were not disclosed.
Under the agreement, NationsBank will recommend that the approximately 125 corporations for which it is now the stock transfer agent switch their business to ChaseMellon Shareholder Services.
